47.ara-name: كتاب تفسير القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:“The Prophet looked at the moon and he said: ‘O Aishah! Do you seek refuge with Allah from the evil of this? For indeed this is Al-Ghasiqu Idha Waqab (The darkened one as it darkens).’”

chapter.eng-name: Regarding Al-Muawwadhtayn (Surat Al-Falah and Surat An-Nas)
